name: Project Exodus (FierceLinkle)
description:
Can you really beat the dead?  Can you make it back home?

Try to escape the dungeon you've been thrown in, battle enemies in turn based combat and explore to find items that'll help you.

Controls:

  • WASD Move
  • Left Shift - Run
  • Left Mouse - Interact

Credits: 

A game made for IS71077A: Approaches to Play 1 - Coursework 2

Art by: Kayleigh Keen, Kenny, Luiz Melo.

Music from: Free Sound, soundimage.org, nosoapradiotracks, FesliyanStudios.
